description.zh: 資料表示法：定點系統 (Fixed Point System)，浮點系統 (Floating Point System)，2. 運算工作：定點之加減乘除，快速之運算，浮點運算，3. 指令與控制：各種指令介紹，中斷，硬體控制單元設計 (Hardwired Control)，微程式控制單元設計 (Microprogramming)，4. 記憶系統：記憶體之層次 (Memory Hierarchy)，虛擬記憶系統 (Virtual memory)，快速記憶 (Cache Memory)。
description.en: 1.Data representation 2.Logic operations3.Command and control 4.Memory organization 5.Processor organization

description.zh: 課程分為兩主軸，技術成面以感知真實的角度循序討論數位呈現的相關技術。在研究理論方面則介紹相關之現有研究、研究工具、與研究方法，並討論與人互動之感知研究的理論與操作，心理物理學的實驗設計與受試者保護規範之實驗計畫書撰寫。
description.en: This course introduces research methods applicable in the field of design with particular emphasize on the human interaction. Topics including Psychophysics, perceptual study, HCI experiment design, hypothesis testing, and statistical analysis. The aim of this course is to help students in identifying a research topic in the field of interaction design, designing an experiment, and preparing the necessary documents including research proposal and consent form to recruit human subjects to participate in the experiment.

notes: 預選限 12 人，日 / 職碩 / 外碩 / 設計博合開 (英), 光華 409

description.zh: 本課程旨在講授互動式廣告的理論、企劃與製作原理，包括互動式媒體的特性、廣告專案製作之掌握、發揮互動式媒體特性的方法，以及建置、設計、發展、與維護互動式廣告所需的相關概念、科技與技能。本課程透過課堂中關於互動式廣告原理的講授、相關的個案研究以及文獻導讀使學生能具備互動式廣告之企劃與研究分析能力。學生評量方式包含報告繳交以及分組討論與發表。
description.en: This course is focused on introducing the theory, planning and techniques of interactive advertisement, which includes the characteristics of interactive media, project management of advertisement, techniques of developing the interactive media, and the way to construct, design, create and maintain the interactive advertisement. The course is preceded by means of lecturing related theory, case studies and literature review to allow students to be capable of interactive advertisement planning and analysis. Students are evaluated by reports, group discussion and presentation.

notes: 限本系生 15 人，日職合開

description.zh: 這是一門土研所的選修課，由內容包括：地震學及地震工程，強地動，振動時最高粒子速度之預測，自然頻率與阻尼之估計與量測，地盤反應分析，基地影響與設計地盤震動，打樁振動分析與永久位移，微振動量測與分析，爆炸設計等。課程中並學習使用軟體 Matlab 作為分析計算之主要工具。
description.en: This course is optional to all postgraduate students. The content of lectures:Seismology and earthquakes, Strong fround motion, prediction of peak particle vibrations, microvibrations, blast design.

description.zh: 本課程針對不同應用主題，諸如人事、財務、物料安全、品質、進度、環保等進行管理科學之介紹，並進行應用研究探討，此外有關作業研究、系統模擬等分析方法亦將於課程中詳加介紹。
description.en: This cause will introduce the management science and application of personnel, finance, safety, material, quality,schedule and environmental protection. Meanwhile,the analysis methods of activity research and system simulation will also be dicussed.

description.zh: 模糊理論基本觀念模糊數學模糊多屬性決策分析應用實例分析
description.en: The course introduces fuzzy theory and related models to improve the effectiveness of disaster management. The main content includes concepts of logic, fuzzy set, fuzzy relation, fuzzy math, fuzzy logic, calculation principles, and some important performance evaluation methods and application algorithms which are often used with fuzzy theory. The course may help students not only touching the key concepts of fuzzy theory, but also independently doing deeper research in fuzzy, evaluation, and management field.

name.zh: 模糊理論在災害管理之應用
name.en: Application of Fuzzy Theory in Disaster Management

description.zh: 本課程主要介紹在計算機科學中常見或基本的資料結構，探討的主題包括: ADT (抽像資料型態) 及複雜度，靜態結構與儲存表示，陣列，堆疊，佇列，串列，樹狀結構，遞迴，排序，搜尋。
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the data structures commonly used in programming languages which include ADT (abstract data type) and complexity, static structures and their storage representations, arrays, stacks, queues, linked lists, trees, recursion, sorting, and searching.

notes: 科研 240 / 資財二甲乙合開

description.zh: 教學目標為幫助學生瞭解多國企業所面對的國際財務管理的議題、其理論及實務。內容包括外匯市場、國際套利、外匯衍生性商品、外匯風險暴露管理、境外市場及國際投資組合管理。
description.en: The goal is to help students understand the theory and practice of the international financial management issues faced by multinational corporations. The course includes the following topics: foreign exchange, foreign exchange arbitrage, foreign exchange derivatives, risk exposure management, offshore market, and the international portfolio management.

notes: 科研 235/111-2 新聘專案教師 / 資財三甲乙合開

description.zh: 為因應瞬息萬變的金融投資環境，期許學生具備宏觀的投資管理知識，本課程主要本課程結合資訊工具與軟體運用、以深入淺出方式介紹投資決策之基本觀念及理論架構，並搭配財務軟體、財金資料庫、與財金資訊網站的應用。藉由這些資訊工具與技術，將財務投資的觀念與原理加以運用於重要的投資決策。課程內容架構包括：(1) 財務與投資學原理；(2) 資料庫的使用；(3) 財務軟體的操作；(4) 財務與投資個案分析。透過本課程之學習，促使投資人能獲取合理的投資報酬或擊敗大盤，領先各基金之績效，以制訂出正確的長短期投資決策。
description.en: In response to the rapidly changing environment of financial investments, expecting that students have knowledge of macro investment management, this course combines information and software tools to use, the major goal of this course is to help students understanding the basic principles and theories of investments. By mixing explanation and implementation using financial software and database, it can give students the skills to conduct a sophisticated assessment on investment decisions. The major topics include the following: (1) principles of investments, (2) financial database, (3) financial software, and (4) case study in investments. Through the learning of this course, prompting investors to be able to obtain a reasonable return on investment or beat the market, ahead of the performance of each Fund, in order to work out the correct short and long term investment decisions.

name.en: Application of Investment Decision and Information

description.zh: 以深入淺出的方式，說明區塊鏈的技術及衍生的新商業模式，再進入以太坊區塊鏈的核心 - 智能合約，使學生能掌握 Solidity 程式語言，培養開發智能合約的能力，也能搭配 web3j、Ganache 等程式及工具，架設開發、測試的環境，並部署智能合約。更結合前端網頁及實務應用，創新創意或解決產業痛點，開發 DApp 實現解決方案。
description.en: Explain that the technology of the blockchain and the new business model derived, and then enter the core of the Ethereum blockchain-smart contracts.Let students master the Solidity programming language, cultivate the ability to develop smart contracts, and use web3j, Ganache and other tools to set up a development and testing environment, and deploy smart contracts.Combining front-end web pages and practical applications, innovative design or solving industrial problems, and developing DApp implementation solutions.

notes: 科研 240 / 資財三四甲乙合開

description.zh: 課程會涵蓋資訊能力與財金的整合來協助學生了解 FINTEC 服務。接下來透過設計思考來帶領學生透過設計一服務創新主題，讓學生以學習到的方法工具，進行實地演練，透過發表與評價，體驗完整的創新旅程，同時建立分組的創新作品集。
description.en: The course develops practical approaches for understanding and analyzing the servie of financial technologies (FinTech). The course will use design thinking to take students through the design of the User Experience (UX) and User-Interface (UI) of a product or service of their creation.

name.zh: 金融科技與服務創新流程

notes: 科研 240 / 資財三四甲乙碩合開

description.zh: 本課程將邀請產、官、學界知名人士，以演講或座談的方式，與 EMBA 學生交流溝通及討論。利用這些知名人士的實務經驗與學養，來啟發 EMBA 學生的創意與想法。
description.en: This course will invite the renowned individuals in business, government, and universities to exchange ideas and opinions with the EMBA students through invited speech or seminar. The idea is to utilize the practical experience and knowledge possessed by these individuals to inspire the innovation and thinking of EMBA students.

notes: 碩二必修，台北集中上課，國際會議廳

description.zh: 本課程旨在幫助學生在論文寫作以及企業研究方法上建立足夠的知識與技能。課程內容主要分為兩部分，第一部分將介紹論文架構，緊接著介紹如何撰寫緒論、文獻探討、研究方法、結果分析、討論、結論及參考文獻，配合課程中的實際案例討論，指導學生應注意的論文格式與規範。本課程的第二部分則在介紹目前企業研究上常用的各種數量方法，各種數量方法的原理及其應用的領域將以實際案例解釋說明，透過上課解說演練、討論、作業、報告等方式使學生熟悉各種研究方法。主要教授的研究方法包括層級分析法、網路程序分析、TOPSIS、VIKOR、灰關聯法、決策實驗分析法、模糊理論、約略集合及基本多變量分析。所教授的各種的研究方法將以 Excel 進行分析與計算演練，本課程學習結束後，學生應當能具備足夠的能力撰寫論文並了解使用各種研究方法於企業問題解決。
description.en: The objective of this course is to help students build up the knowledge/skills in thesis writing and business research methods. The content of the course can be divided into two major parts. The first part will begin from the introduction of thesis structure, followed by how to write the introduction, literature review, methodology, result analysis, discussion, remarking and reference. The format of thesis will also be illustrated by some class examples. The second part of the class will begin with the introduction of different quantitative methods commonly used in business research methods today. The categories of research methods and their applicable problems are then presented using real-world case studies. Students can learn different decision-making tools through lectures, discussions, assignments, term-projects, and in-class practices. The main methods include AHP, ANP, TOPSIS, VIKOR, DEMATEL, Gray Relation Methods, Fuzzy Set Theory, Rough Set Theory, and some basic multivariate

notes: B-2 班 碩一必修 (個案寫作或論文寫作 2 選 1)，集中上課

description.zh: 公司治理已成為廿一世紀企業組織架構調整之重大議題，如何經由管理策略及法制設計使台灣企業經營回歸股東長期價值及利益，為政府、交易所與公會等自律機關、及企業經營者必須面對之問題。在法制上，獨立董事監察人、審計委員會之設置、公司自律守則之擬議、股東會之運作，均衝擊我國公司法、證券交易法及交易所規則現行管理架構及規範；在實務上，上市櫃公司如何順利接受公司治理之理念及管理規範，以提昇公司營運的外在評價與體質。
description.en: The corporate governance had been the enterprise framework adjustment of the main issue of the 21 century. How do the manage the corporate strategy and system of the law to make the profit for the shareholder, government and enterprise. The main purpose of the course to help the learner to understand the law of corporate and the practice of the enterprise.

description.zh: 現代人工作壓力大，許多上班族都有壓力、失眠、焦慮等問題。醫學也發現，身體許多疾病甚至癌症也都和情緒、壓力有關。目前，已經證實正念減壓：可以降低壓力與焦慮，疲勞，降低員工的職業倦怠程度和離職率。提升睡眠品質，增強孼疫系統，提升專注力，提高領導效能，提升大腦功能與創造力，促進幸福感。滿意度，情緒管理能力、創造力、與人際溝通能力，提高工作績效。改善了個人健康、工作與家庭生活！因此，目前歐美和國內的各大企業紛紛引入正念課程，以提高員工和企業績效。
description.en: There are so many people with the high stress in the workplace. It’s demonstrated that practicing mindfulness can bring improvements in both physical and psychological symptoms as well as positive changes in health, attitudes, and behaviors. The advantages of integrating mindfulness in the workplace including:higher brain functioning;reduced work-related stress, anxiety, depression, fatigue, and psychological distress .Improves job performance, greater job satisfaction, and decreasing turnover and burnout.

name.en: Mindfulness for Leadership and Stress Reduction

notes: (群組 2) 組織領導與人力資源管理，綜科第 2 演講廳

description.zh: 圖像數位畫技術已然成熟，並朝多向度發展，深入各個應用領域。本課程重點是針對藝術與設計應用的相關技術，介紹相關的電腦圖像技術原理，並探討未來的發展趨勢。透過藝術創作與設計案例，協助學生建立對各類型數位圖像科技之整合能力。
description.en: This course is directed to discuss the theories and applications of computer graphics and the future development of the technology. The students will be provided with integrating the related technologies of computer graphics through the real design cases in digital environment.

description.zh: 數位化設計專案包含研究與設計。設計專案透過工業設計的理論、方法及程序，以研究的手段形成設計決策，或以實證的方式將研究成果應用於設計實務。設計專案之設計成果必須建立在相關的研究基礎上。
description.en: This course is directed toward an approved digitized design project withresearch and design completed under supervision of the director. Theory andpractice in research and development dealing with the design project isreviewed in the study. Projects must represent a meaningful contribution tothe field of design base on supportive research.

name.zh: 數位化設計專案研究 (一)

description.zh: 統計數據分析是一種利用數據對遇到問題進行適當推測的藝術 (有時是最好)，本課程是一門以微積分為基礎的統計學分析的入門課程，旨在幫助學生學習描述性和推論性的統計程序，以及在不同領域中使用有用的數據分析。在回顧描述性統計和一些必要的概率分佈後，我們將討論區間估計、點估計、假說檢定方差分析、線性回歸分析、因子設計、聚類分析的基本概念、分類和支持向量機，並伴隨著實踐和理論練習。因此這些技能將為學生提供一個基礎，培養學生獨自進行分析和有效評估他人統計分析結果的能力。
description.en: ‘Statistical data analytics’ is the art of using data to make appropriate (sometimes, best!) conjectures about problems encountered. This course is a calculus-based introduction to statistics and data analytics, and so designed to help students learn the introductory descriptive and inferential statistical procedures, and useful data analytics that are used in diverse areas. After a review of descriptive statistics and some necessary probability distributions, we will discuss interval and point estimation, hypothesis tests, ANOVA, linear regression analysis, factorial designs, and basic concept of cluster analysis, classification, and support vector machines accompanying practical and theoretical exercises. Consequently, these skills will provide the student with a basis to conduct their own such analyzes and to evaluate critically others’ uses of statistical analysis results.

notes: 工管三甲乙丙合開，計中電腦教室

description.zh: 本課程著重於探索問卷研究方法與統計資料分析。同學將對問卷調查研究有通盤的了解。本課程將介紹問卷調查研究的整體流程，從問卷的建構與施行起始，其中包含問卷問題的設計、抽樣、問卷模式與施行；再著重於問卷資料的分析與統計結果的報告呈現。同學將於這門課運用各類統計分析方法進行問卷研究的實作。
description.en: This course focuses on exploring the methods and techniques in survey research and data analysis. Students will be guided to develop a comprehensive understanding of survey research methods. The course will introduce all aspects of the survey research process: from exploring the construction and implementation of surveys–including the design of survey questionnaires, sample selection, choice of survey mode, and survey administration–onto the analysis of survey data and reporting of results. Students will also gain first-hand experience of survey analysis using a variety of statistical techniques.

name.zh: 問卷研究與統計分析實務
name.en: Survey Research and Statistical Analysis in Practice

description.zh: 自動化機構運動及動力分析、控制理論與氣液壓學簡介、機構元件說明、馬達及感測器選用。
description.en: Kinematic and dynamic Analysis of automatic mechanisms, Control theorem, Introduction to pneumatics and Hydraulics,Mechanism elements, Selection of motors and sensors.

description.zh: 課程內容包括：原理探討：超音波，磁場與磁性，電磁感應與渦電流，輻射線，液體表面現象，材料微結構；方法介紹：磁場檢測法，超音波檢測法，渦電流檢測法，X 光檢測法，液滲法，微奈米檢測 (各種顯微鏡) 等；材料非破壞檢測實驗：導電性材料、磁性材料、陶瓷材料、複合材料之缺陷檢測；結構非破壞檢測實驗：機械零件、以及特定結構之檢測；非破壞檢測影像：電腦數據擷取、數據分析、與影像處理
description.en: Introduce the concepts of following topics, Fundamentals: ultrasonic waves, magnetic field and magnetism, electromagnetic induction and eddy currents, X-rays, penetrants. NDT methods: ultrasonic testing, magnetoscopic inspections, eddy current testing, radiographic technique, penetrants method. NDT of materials: conductive materials, magnetic materials, ceramics, composite materials. NDT of structures: mechanical components, specific structures. NDT images: PC-based data acquisition, data analysis and image process.

name.zh: 材料與結構非破壞檢測
name.en: Non-Destructive Testing of Materials and Structures

description.zh: 本課程經由邀請產官學界專家蒞校進行講座課程演講及論壇之方式，進行創意與創新思維之實例教學，使學生能儘早瞭解企業創新之模式及相關理論，以啟發學生之創意，促進學術與產業之互動與交流，縮短產學距離。
description.en: This course conducts the instances teaching of creativity and innovate thinking by invite industry, government and academic experts to give lectures and forums. The mine objective is to enable students to understand about the innovation model and related theories of enterprises as soon as possible, and to inspire students’ creativity. Furthermore, promote interaction between academic and industry; and to shorten the distance between academic and industry.

name.zh: 創新講座 - 創意與創新思維 (二)

notes: 工設四與日職碩合開，職碩限 25 人，科研國際會議廳，創創

description.zh: 本課程在訓練學生如何使用電腦輔助設計軟体來設計電力電子積體電路，進而能培養學生具有設計電力電子積體電路的能力，課程內容包念： 1. 電源管理 IC 設計簡介 2. 電壓參考電路設計 3. 低電壓降電壓調整器設計 4. 交換式電壓調整器 5. 交換電容電源轉換器 6. 電池充電技術與應用 7. 設計專題討論
description.en: This course is trained the student to use computer-aided design tools for the design of power electronic integrated circuit. Therefore, the student has the design capability of power electronic integrated circuit. The contents of this course: 1.Introduction to power management IC design 2. Voltage reference Design 3.Low dropout regulator design 4. Switching voltage regulator 5.Switching Capacitor Regulator 6.Battery charging techniques and applications 7.Design project discussion

name.zh: 電力電子積體電路設計

description.zh: 機器學習探討如何能由觀測到的資料中自我學習，自我進化，而能自動增進其處理效能。例如進行預測，特徵擷取，分類，模式辨認，決策，各種訊號處理，甚至建立人工智慧等等。本課程將介紹機器學習的基礎演算法、理論及工具。並讓學生嘗試在各種領域中實際實踐這些技術。課程內容包括：(a) 監督式學習（例如參數和非參數演算法、支持向量機和類神經網路等），(b) 無監督學習（例如群聚、降維和深度學習等）與 (c) 機器學習應用實例（例如語音信號處理，影像訊號處理，音訊訊號處理與自然語言處理，資訊擷取與資料搜尋等）。
description.en: Machine learning studies how to automatically learn from observed data to improve the performance of prediction, information extraction, clustering, pattern recognition, decision making, signal processing and even artificial intelligence. This course will introduce fundamental algorithms, theories and their practical applications. The content will cover (a) supervised learning, such as parametric and non-parametric algorithms, super vector machines and neural networks, (b) unsupervised learning, for example, data clustering, dimension reduction and deep learning and (c) practical applications on speech, image, audio signal and natural language processing or information retrieval and search, etc.

description.zh: 本課程將延續財務工程導論的內容，將持續在債券與衍生性商品評價、避險以及風險控管等問題上繼續深入探討；本學期將把焦點放在債券投資的避險、股票衍生性商品與利率衍生性商品的評價與避險上，並利用 C (或 C++) 和 Matlab 兩種工具來執行樹狀結構，以評價選擇權的價值。
description.en: This course will still focus on the methods for bond and derivatives pricing and hedging, such as the evaluation of stock and bond options. For implementation purposes associated with the concepts introduced, such as the tree structure, two programming languages for computation will be provided: C (or C++ ) and Matlab.

notes: 科研 240 / 資財三四甲乙合開

description.zh: 瞭解常見之演算法及其分析，1.Complexity、Big-Oh 符號，2. 演算法之分析，3. 集合、優先佇列，4. 樹、平衡樹，5. 排序演算法，6. 搜尋演算法，7. 圖形演算法，8. 幾何演算法，9.NP-complete problems 之理論及對策。
description.en: 1.Complexity 2.Analysis of algorithms3.Set,priorty queue4.Tree,Balanced tree5.Sorting algorithms6.Search algorithms7.Graph algorithms8.Geometry algorithms9.NP-complete problems

description.zh: 產品企劃對於一家公司來說非常重要，因為如果做得好，它可以減少資源支出，增加收入並創造利潤。新產品開發時，產品企劃的嚴謹與洞見為影響產品成敗的重要因素，本課程將介紹產品企劃的基本觀念、產品開發流程、產品策略、產品生命週期、市場區隔與企畫書的撰寫等。本課程以實際產品企劃案例作為教材，導入情境式教學，讓學生融入產品企劃個案之實境，於課堂上共同討論如何擬定個案的處理方式與企劃方法，達到理論與實務充分的對話。
description.en: Product planning is very important to a company because, when done properly, it can reduce resource expenditures, drive revenues, and generate profitability. In the development of new products, Product planning is an important factors affecting the success or failure of products. This course will introduce the basic concepts of product planning, product development process, product strategy, product life cycle, market segmentation, and Product planning book. This course takes real product planning cases as teaching materials, import situational teaching, and integrates students into the realities of product planning cases. We will discuss how to formulate the right decision-making and planning methods in class to achieve a dialogue between theory and practice.

name.zh: 產品企劃個案研究專題

description.zh: 本課程主要以公平交易法與營業秘密法之立法目的、沿革及發展趨勢為出發點，探討此二法律在規範對象、方法及競合等之差異；深入分析公平交易法與營業秘密法之內涵，進而個別探討公平交易法與營業秘密法等之智財權利行使的課題。
description.en: This course majors in the purpose, evolution, and development trend of legislation on the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, with an attempt to differentiate between the two Acts in respect of objects, approaches, and choice of law that the Acts apply to.  In this course, analyses are also made, in depth, on the essence of the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act, together with discussion, respectively, on implementation of Intellectual Property Rights involved in the Fair Trade Act and the Trade Secret Act.

name.zh: 營業秘密法與公平交易法專題研究
name.en: Monographic Study on Trade Secret Act and Fair Trade Act

description.zh: 本課程將介紹經濟分析之研究方法，不僅探討為何經濟分析之研究方法受到重視外，還會討論以經濟分析之研究方法，來具體檢視著作權、專利權、商標權、營業秘密等相關之智慧財產權，以達成理論與實際並重之教學目的。
description.en: This course will be introductions regarding research methods of economic analyses. This course not only why this research methods of economic analyses are important, but also discusses copyright, patent, trademark, and trade secrets, etc. Purpose of this course is both to put emphasis on theories and practices for teaching.

name.en: Economic Analyses of Intellectual Property Rights

notes: 先鋒 1401 教室，適合碩一，日職合開

description.zh: 數位通訊系統簡介，數位調變及偵測，數據譯碼及錯誤更正碼，同步 (載波及時刻訊號的還原)，多工技術，通訊網路技術。
description.en: introduction to design communication systems, digitalmodulation and detection, data signaling and error correction codes, synchronization,multiplexing techniques,communiation networks.

notes: 電機四甲乙丙丁合開專案，專案

description.zh: 先修課程：3002010 或負責教授同意。鑄造用材料、鑄鐵、鑄鋼及非鐵金屬之鑄造、鑄造品之熱處理、特殊鑄造程序及方法。
description.en: Pattern, Molding Processes and Materials, Molding Processes, Cores, Solidification of Metals, Principles of Metallurgy,  Gating Systems Pouring, Materials for Foundry Engineering,  Casting Steel and Non-metals, Heat treatment of Casting Works, Special Casting Processes and Methods etc.

notes: 限 50 人，新聘專案教師，一般教室

description.zh: 本課程主要是介紹 H∞的理論及如何以精簡易懂的數學工具掌握強健控制設計，進而認識 H∞控制的物理特性及優缺點，並其他控制方法作比較。
description.en: This course mainly introduces the theory of H∞ and how to utilize the mathematical tool to design the H∞ controller. Besides, the physical meaning and the comparison with others control methods are also will be introduced in this course.

description.zh: 本課程將結合理論說明與示範實習，使同學對雷射基本原理及光電科技應用有一完整的認識，內容包括：1. 光電工程概論，2. 基礎光學，3. 電射發光原理，4. 雷射光的調製，5. 光電科技應用概論。
description.en: The course covers bath lectures and lab exercise1.Introduction 2.Fundamentals of optics3.Laser principles4.Electrooptic modulation of laser beams5.Applications of electrooptic techniques

description.zh: 企業常常是網路攻擊的主要目標，這門課程主旨在教育修課學生如何成功防禦常見的網路威脅並且確保自己的金融服務安全運作。本課程首先提供網絡安全的總體描述，指導同學了解目前面臨網絡威脅風險的一些最重要的服務和技術。熟悉該主題後，您將根據案例研究和現實生活場景探索特定技術和威脅。隨著同學們學習模組的進展，將發現漏洞和錯誤（包括人為風險因素），從而獲得有關最新威脅的專家級視野。然後，同學們將探索有關如何實現資料和基礎架構保護的資訊。在總結模組中，同學們將獲得流程和配置的最新重大更新，以及與基於資訊技術的金融服務中的網絡安全研究和開發相關的重要細節。在課程最後，同學們將接觸到並對未來資訊安全的技術有初步的了解，以及如何保護未來的金融服務與相關的基礎建設。同學們將會學到：?	了解企業所面臨之網路威脅？	探索如何辨識攻擊者？	呈現弱點評估、軟體測試、滲透測試？	使用緩解技術與補救計畫捍衛自己的金融網路？	實做加解密系統？	了解人工智慧如何影響網路安全
description.en: Enterprises have always been a target of cybercrime. This course teaches you how to successfully defend your system against common cyber threats, making sure your financial services are a step ahead in terms of security.The course begins by providing an overall description of cybersecurity, guiding you through some of the most important services and technologies currently at risk from cyber threats. Once you have familiarized yourself with the topic, you will explore specific technologies and threats based on case studies and real-life scenarios. As you progress through the modules, you will discover vulnerabilities and bugs (including the human risk factor), gaining an expert-level view of the most recent threats. You'll then explore information on how you can achieve data and infrastructure protection. In the concluding modules, you will cover recent and significant updates to procedures and configurations, accompanied by important details related to cybersecurity research and deve

notes: 科研 243/111-2 新聘專任教師 / 資財三四甲乙碩合開 / 全英

description.zh: 資訊安全保險相關事故的理賠調查，使得數位鑑識在金融或資訊領域的重要性日益提升。數位鑑識與調查課程主要說明如何找到入侵或犯罪留下的可能的足跡，並介紹如何在合法與符合鑑識程序規範的前提下蒐集足夠的證據並保護這些有用的證據，以做為未來訴訟有效的佐證。在課程的設計上將以數位鑑識相關國際證照的領域與內容為主，除了教授學生數位鑑識的專業知識外，期能輔導學生取得數位鑑識相關證照。
description.en: The cyber security incident investigation for the cyber insurance has made digital forensics more and more important in the financial or information industry. This course focuses on identifying possible footprints of intrusions or crimes and collecting sufficient evidence and protect such useful evidence in order to be effective in future litigation. In the design of the course, the domain and content of the digital forensics international certification licenses will be mainly used. In addition to teaching the professional knowledge of digital forensics, it can also help the students obtain digital forensics certification in the future.

notes: 科研 240 / 資財四甲乙碩合開 / 全英語授課

description.zh: 1. 簡介；2. 組合邏輯系統設計；3. 標準組合邏輯模組；4. 算術組合模組與網路；5. 順序邏輯系統設計；6. 標準順序邏輯模組；7. RTL 系統；8. 資料及控制子系統；9. 微處理器設計。10. 數位系統設計之原則與方法；11. ASM (Algorithm StateMachine) Chart 之應用與序向邏輯方法：傳統式合成法、多工器控制法、One-Hot 法、ROM-Based 法；12. ASIC 所需之基本 SSI/MSI 元件；13. 使用 SSI/MSI 基本元件解決邏輯問題；14. 採用數位系統設計之原理與方法，利用 ASIC 之基本元件，再配合基本閘設計 ALU、CPU 控制器、中斷控制器、DMA 控制器等 IC 元件；15.Bit-Slice 計算機設計；16. 微程式設計；17.Hardwired CPU 設計。
description.en: 1. Introduction; 2. Design of combinational systems; 3. Standard combinational modules; 4. Arithmetic combinational modules and networks5. Design of sequential network; 6. Standard sequential network; 7. Register transfer level (RTL) systems; 8. Data and control subsystems; 9. Design of a microcomputer; 7.Principles of digital system design; 8.ASM chart 9.SSI/MSI component 10.Application of ASIC component 11.Bit-Slice machine 12.Hardwared CPU design.

description.zh: 本課程包含 2 大部份，服務與創新管理及智慧財產權與科技法律。 服務與創新管理旨在了解服務與創新管理之意義、方法與現況，內容包含服務之本質、創新之意義、服務與創新管理之方法、科技之應用、服務與創新管理現況介紹等。智慧財產權與科技法律旨在了解如何以智慧財產權來保護科技研發成果，內容包括智慧財產權法規介紹與專利運用策略實務。
description.en: This course contains two major parts, service and innovation management and Intellectual property and technology law. Service and innovation management is to demonstrate the definition, the methodologies and the state of the art of service and innovation management, including the nature of service, innovation, the tools for service and innovation management, technology application and current development of service and innovation management. Intellectual property and technology law is to demonstrate understanding how to protect R & D achievements with intellectual property rights. This course includes intellectual property laws and patent strategies practice.

name.en: Introduction to Services and Technology Management

description.zh: 網路行銷包含資訊技術與行銷觀念，這門課希望融合者兩面的觀點，在使同學了解網路行銷的理論與實務，輔以資料分析之技術，介紹目前常用的推薦系統、客戶分群等行銷資料分析，此外，也輔以期刊論文的研讀來加強同學的學術理論基礎。
description.en: E-Marketing involves information technology and marketing. The course will explore information technology/systems concepts from a non-technical perspective and examine how the marketing function is influenced by emerging technology trends. In addition, some famous e-marketing technique would be introduced in this course including recommender system, customer segmentation and so on.  This course also discusses the journal paper to enhance the students' theoretical bases

notes: 科研 243 / 資財四甲乙碩合開

description.zh: 課程重點：(1) 藉由適合其程度的教材加強學生必備的基礎文法觀念和句型結構；(2) 使學生確切把握閱讀要領以及充分瞭解寫作的各種技巧，重心在生字、片語、句法的解釋和基本寫作技巧的分析；(3) 熟悉英語人士日常生活情境及與學生將來就業環境相關之會話及適當之應對方式；(4) 透過練習加強聽、說、讀、寫的知能及表達。
description.en: This course is designed (1) to strengthen students' previously required knowledge in English with basic grammatical ideas and sentence patterns reviewed through reading materials appropriate to their levels; (2) to develop reading skill by giving explanation of difficult words, phrases, and syntax, as well as analysis of basic writing skill; (3)to  familiarize students with useful expressions in conversation and build up their confidence in cross-cultural communication; (4)to reinforce the competence and performance of listening, speaking, reading and writing by practice.

notes: B 班 中 1 賀一平

description.zh: 本課主旨在設計課程，提供練習，俾使學生嫻熟各式的英語測驗，如全民英檢、托福測驗、TOEIC 測驗或類似性質的測驗，希冀能夠藉由本課程的修習，提升學生不斷的學習外國語的興致，並且，藉由通過考試取得證照，增加未來職場的競爭力。
description.en: This course is designed to familiarize the students with various kinds of language proficiency tests such as GEPT, TOEFL, TOEIC and many others to the same end. It is our hope that the students who finish taking the course will go on with their enthusiasm on studying foreign languages; besides, through the acquisition of the certificate when the students pass the tests, they are sure to enhance their capability in the increasingly competitive job markets.

name.en: Course in English language Proficiency Tests

notes: 本課程為未通過英文畢業門檻之課程；林煜善老師

description.zh: 電腦稽核已廣泛的應用在金融交易，企業財務與進銷存流程與資訊系統的各項領域來協助找出瑕疵，降低與防範風險，並能做趨勢預測。本課程的目的將機器學習與人工智慧的技術應用在電腦稽核領域，主題包含：電腦稽核的流程，大量資料的整理與萃取，監督式與非監督式學習在稽核的應用，資料視覺化技術等。
description.en: Computer auditing has been widely used in financial transactions, enterprise business processes, and information systems, which is to help find flaws and reduce risks, and be able to predict trends. The purpose of this course is to apply machine learning technology in the field of computer auditing. Topics include Computer auditing related processes, the extraction and manipulation of large-scaled data, supervised and unsupervised learning in auditing applications, data visualization technology.

name.zh: 機器學習輔助電腦稽核

notes: 科研 240/111-2 新進專任教師 / 資財四甲乙碩合開 / 全英

description.zh: 先修課程：4403053 或負責教授同意本徵值與本徵函數，向量分析，向量微積分，傅立葉級數與邊界值問題，偏微分方程，複變函數。
description.en: Eigenvalue and Eigenfunction Problems, Vector Analyses, Calculus of Vectors, Fourier Series, Boundary Value Problems, Partial Differential Equations, Complex Analyses.

description.zh: 化學是富挑戰性且具教學難度之科目，使這個複雜的學科讓學生易於接受化學教育家的挑戰，特別是基礎化學。嘗試推展關鍵的化學概念，並以觀察現象為主，再討論理論模式，並用以解釋所觀測的現象是本課程的重點。希望學生實踐 "如同一個化學家的思考方式" 來仔細觀察，而不是跳入公式或模型中。此外，舉例證明化學在現實生活中的重要性與最新的應用及發展並以簡易明瞭的方式呈現於授課內容。
description.en: Chemistry is fascinating and important subject that is challenging to teach and even more challenging to learn. Marking this complex subject accessible to students without distortion is challenge of the chemical educator, especially at the introductory level.In this lecture I try to develop key chemical concept in the same way to show the observations first and then discuss the models that have been constructed to explain the observed behavior. I hope students will practice "thinking like a chemist" by carefully studying the observation to see if they can follow the thought process, rather than just jumping head to the equation or model that will follow.In addition, to demonstrate the importance of chemistry in real life, I have incorporated throughout the book a number of applications and recent advances in essay form.

description.zh: （一）瞭解人力資源發展之定義、內涵與功能；（二）培養進行人力資源發展之基本能力。課程內容包括：人力資源發展之定義與內涵、人力資源發展之需求評估、人力資源規劃、學習理論、訓練方法、教材編撰、訓練發展評量及國際化人力資源發展等。課程實施方法為講解、討論、參觀訪問及專題討論。
description.en: The course aims to (1) understand the definition, essence, and function of human resources development, (2) cultivate the fundamental capability of human resource development. It covers the definition and essence of human resources development, demand evaluation of human resource development, planning of human resource, learning theories, training method; curriculum designing and compilation, evaluation of training development, and international human resource development. The course is conducted through lectures, discussions, field trip activities, and colloquia.

notes: 新聘專任教師，共同 302 教室

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。本校體育課程目標為鍛鍊健全身心、促進身心健全發展、培養運動道德、發揚團隊精神及養成終身運動習慣。四技一年級實施普通班體育正課教學。四技二、三年級實施專項分組教學，由具有專長之教師授課。開課項目：籃球、排球、桌球、羽球、保齡球、射箭、高爾夫球、網球、體操遊戲、慢速壘球、太極拳、國際標準舞、體適能、國術。學生得按自己興趣選擇修習。
description.en: All students are required to attend two hours per week of Physical Education class.  This requirement applies to Freshman Sophomore and Junior students while it is an elective for senior students.  For Freshman level, Classes focus on basic physical strength training.  For Sophomore and Junior students, classes are interest-oriented, thus giving students the opportunity to select specific activities they are interested in.  Choices include Basketball, Volleyball, Table Tennis, Badminton, Bowling, Archery, Golf, Tennis, Gymnastics, Slow pitch, Tai Chi Chuan, Ballroom Dancing, Physical Fitness and martial arts, to mention a few.

description.zh: 此課程之目標為多媒體系統整介紹，包含介紹所有影像和視訊的標準格式、視訊的壓縮基本原理，目前主流的視訊壓所標準格式，讓學生了解到 1. 多媒體簡介 2. 多媒體發展平台 3. 多媒體資訊系統設計 4. 多媒體資訊系統實體建置。課程內容包含: 1. 多媒體資料簡介 2. 多媒體發展平台 3. 多媒體資料處理 4. 多媒體壓縮技術 5. 多媒體標準架構 6. 多媒體系統設計 7. 多媒體實體建置
description.en: This course is mainly aimed at introducing the Multimedia Systems, including: (1) Introduction to Multimedia Systems (2)Multimedia Platforms for developers (3)Digital Signal Processing for Multimedia Systems (4) Data and Image Compression for Multimedia Systems (5) Multimedia Frameworks (6) Design of Multimedia Systems (7) Develop and Manage Multimedia Systems

notes: 電子三四甲乙、四丙合開，新聘教師崔紘嘉

description.zh: 曲軸沖床、各單元件之設計與構造要點、剪斷原理與過程、變形原理、成形現象、引伸原理、力的分析、設計實例、連續引伸的設計程序。
description.en: Structure and design Fundamental element of craft, punching, principle and process of steaming cutting, principles of deformation, forming phenomena, design and manufacturing process of continuous stretching.

notes: 限 50 人，新聘專案教師，一般教室

description.zh: 本課程的主要目的在教授學生機器學習、大數據等人工智慧技術，並使用在物聯網的創新與應用上。課程內容包括：人工智慧概論、大數據方法、機器學習方法、資料探勘方法、最佳化方法、物聯網概論、影音處理、雲端技術、物聯網系統實作等。
description.en: This course is to instruct students the basics of artificial intelligent methods and apply these methods to innovative applications of Internet of Things. The contents include introduction to artificial intelligence, machine learning methods, data mining methods, optimization methods, introduction to internet of things, video and audio processing, cloud computing, and innovation project implementation.

name.en: Intelligent Applications of Internet of Things

notes: 電子四甲乙丙合開，新聘教師崔紘嘉

description.zh: 本門課藉由濕空氣線圖討論空氣調節之過程，分析人體舒適與空氣品質之需求，及各種空調設備系統之設計。本門課在空調負荷計算原理與方法涵蓋輻射熱、熱傳導及熱儲存效應等之分析，系統設計包括送風與送水系統之計算與設計，及室內送風分佈之理論與設計。
description.en: Air-conditioning processes are discussed by using psychrometric charts. Thermal comfort and indoor air quality requirements are presented. Design of air-conditioning equipment and systems are introduced. Air-conditioning load analysis includes radiation, transfer, and heat storage effects. System design includes design and calculation air and water moving systems. Air distribution principles and design are also covered.

notes: 限學號雙數號學生選課

description.zh: 1. 基本 CMOS 邏輯閘設計，2.CMOS 基本邏輯閘時序模擬，3.CMOS 基本邏輯閘佈局，4. 數位電路功能分析與模擬，5. 階層式的電路組成，6. 中小型電路設計，7.VHDL 系統，8. 認識 Cadence 系統，9. 圖形編輯設備的操作練習，10. 零件庫介紹，11. 設計電路之輸入編輯，12. 電路模擬實習，13. 數位電路的晶片設計，14. 電路自動化設計 15. 晶片製造專題。
description.en: 1.Basic CMOS logic design 2.CMOS logic gate simulation 3.CMOS logic gate placement 4.Analysis and simulation of digital circuit 5.Hierachy circuit 6.VHDL system 7.Introduction to c cadence system 8.Graphic editor practice 9.module 10.Input editor 11.Circuit simulation practice 12. Electronic Design Automation 13.Special projects.

notes: 電子三四甲乙丙合開，新聘教師賴建宏，綜科 502

description.zh: 首先介紹歌劇中音樂的元素、本質及角色，欣賞各時期不同類型之歌劇作品，繼由「世界三大男高音」看歌劇曲目的走向，吸引新生代同學對歌劇之響往，帶領愛樂者進入歌劇欣賞的境界。
description.en: This one-semester course is designed to let students learn:  1.to approach to their first opera with open minds and open ears 2. to understand what opera is.  3. to know the essential elements of opera－composers and librettists,  singers, conductors, directors, as well as designs and expenses,...etc.. 4.to understand the development of opera 5.to appreciate opera through watching films of various kind 6.to be able to enjoy opera for the rest of their life.

description.zh: 這 e 世紀時代的資訊交流是一個廣泛、多樣化與複雜的；究竟人們如何透過溝通表達意識與行為，卻變成非常重要。有效的溝通程度常視為學習溝通的指標，須視事實、竟見、感覺、嗜好和經驗進行徹底地交融與分享的結果。因此，本課程重視現代社會學習「溝通管理」的二項關鍵技術包括：有效溝通結合自我學習技巧和方法：商業知識與科技結合促成人的系統互動能力，配合多媒體傳輸工具完成學習個人與團體溝通效益。課程涵概主題：1. 溝通管理定義與本質元素。2. 溝通管理內涵分析。3. 學習個人溝通能力。4. 學習溝通程序。5.e 化自我學習技巧、方法與表達能力。6. 學習全球化溝通科技工具。7. 團隊溝通的策略與協同戰術。8. 塑造整體溝通文化。
description.en: The information exchange is wide, variety, and complicated in the e-era; how do people express their consciousness and behavior turn to become very important. Effective communication degrees usually are seen as the index of learning communication. It depends on thoroughly melting and sharing with fact, opinion, feeling, interesting and experience. Therefore, "Communication Management," in this course we emphasize on two key techniques of modern society learning including: effective communication with self-learning skill and method; Business knowledge and technology with interactive ability of human system. By using multimedia transmitting tools to complete self and group learning communication and get benefit.Course Subjects:1. Definition and essential element of Communication Management.2. Content analysis of Communication Management.3. Learn personal communication ability.4. Learn communication process.5. E-learning skill, method, and expression ability.6. Learn the technical tools

description.zh: 生命科學概論，重心放在人體生命科學，並強化醫學的角色。此外，中西醫結合的觀點，詮釋抗老、防癌。以身心靈養生的方式，強化預防醫學。並從人類疾病的本源性病因，根本探討。當然，如何增強免疫力，袪除自由基是主軸。在探究人體潛能、身心靈養生或疾病的本源性原因時，都必須重視「經絡」系統。總之生命是非常奧妙的，不僅只物質面，更要重視心靈層面，中西醫整合方向，必是廿一世紀的主流。
description.en: This course focuses on human life science and emphasizes the roles of medicine on improving the life quality of human beings. It also uses the point of view of integration traditional Chinese and western medicine to interpret how to prevent the aging of body and occurrence of cancers. This course also focuses on how to keep the body, mind and spirit in the best conditon in order to prevent the occurrence of human diseases. In addition, it deeply discusses the eseential etiology of human disease and teaches audiences how to enhance the body immunity and how to get rid of free radicals. The importance of meridian system of the human body and its relationships to human potentiality, body, mind spirit and diseses are also discussed. Life is marvelous. The completeness of life depends on the saisfaction of not only the material but also menetal and spiritual needs. Integration of the traditional Chinese and western medicine to improve the life quality of human beings is the main issue.

description.zh: 古蹟、歷史建築和聚落為台灣地區文化資產的一部份，亦是台灣社會發展和多元文化交融的歷史見證。這些建築物表出各項的歷史價值與意義，其類型包括了史前遺址、荷西城堡、清代祠廟、墳墓、民居，以及日治時代以後的官署、學校、官舍住宅、土木設施等。本課程的目的，一方面希望讓修課同學對台灣各期建築歷史與形式風格特徵，能有清晰的架構與認識，以作為欣賞台灣古蹟的基礎；另一方面則是養成同學對身處文化環境的關心與歷史人文精神的培養。
description.en: Cultural property, historic building and settlement are the evidence of history development and multiple cultural interaction of Taiwanese society. The types of architecture include excavation, castle, temple, tomb, folk settlement before the Ching dynasty, and official building, school, house and civil engineering facility after the Japanese occupied period. This course hope to help students to understand the architectural history briefly, and get some basic skill about the formative characters of each period. Furthermore, it will train them to give more concern on the cultural environment of Taiwan.

description.zh: 此門課程主要在於瞭解社會學的意涵，並藉由跨領域的學習，讓不同學科能有對話的空間。課程涵蓋的範圍會兼顧理論與實用性，讓學生能思考當今的社會，理解到產生因素的多元性，並進而使個人眼界能更加開拓。期望學生於課程學習中能夠擁有更多對於整個社會的不同思維，以強化本身學科之所需，不但具有理論性深入的洞察力，也能引用到管理上實質的層面。
description.en: The purpose of this course is to understand sociology. It covers theory and practicability, and make students consider the current society, and understand the generated factors of diversity . Expect students' study can have more for the community as a whole different way of thinking, in order to strengthen their academic needs, not only has the theoretical depth of insight, but also on the substance applied to the management level.

description.zh: 西藥及中草藥是中華民族的傳統藥，也是中國藥學寶庫的重組成成分，中草藥包括中藥、草藥（即民間藥）以及少數民族地區使用的民族藥，在中國，使用中草藥防病治病已有數千年之歷史，寶鑑證明，中草藥療效確切，副作用較合成中藥少，力來深受群眾喜愛。當前，人類健康需要傳統醫藥之觀點正為越來越多之國家和人民接受，開發傳統要已成為當今藥物發展的潮流。同時，近年來科學研究成果表明，從中草藥發展出療效好，毒性低的新藥是一條成功的捷徑。因此，學習中草藥之人員日漸增加。本課程共分：西藥概論、中草藥概論、內科中草藥、兒科中草藥、男科中草藥、婦科中草藥、美容養生中草藥等。
description.en: The Drugs on Life is a two credit hours course and design especially for technology students. This curriculum emphasizes on the clinical applications and action mechanisms of various western and Chinese drugs. The curriculum trends will start from more details and bring a completely concepts. The subjects include neuropharmacology, autacoids, cardiovascular drugs, analgesics, anaethesia and drugs actiong on the central nervous system, chemotherapy of microbial disease and neoplastic disease, hormones and hormone antagonists, drugs acting on the blood and some Chinese drugs.

description.zh: 倫理學 (Ethics) 是討論「應不應該」的一門哲學分支。倫理學可分為「微觀倫理學」：探討個人性之行為的應不應該的問題，以及「宏觀的倫理學」：探討整個社會的政治、經濟、法律、社會等方面的問題。倫理學亦可區分為「規範倫理學」及「應用倫理學」兩大類，前者探討善的定義與判斷準則、動機論與結果論、人的意志是否自由、決定論與責任、自律與他律、幸福與快樂、哪些德行 (virtue) 值得追求等等課題，後者則是運用倫理學觀點探討諸如安樂死、墮胎、環保、複製人等種種課題。本課程主要目的是在對倫理學課題與種類作一個基本的介紹，訓練及培養學生在倫理問題上思考的能力，期能讓學生在作道德問題的判斷與抉擇上能夠有所進步。
description.en: This course will introduce basic ideas of Ethics to students. The topics will include: the definition and criterion of good, motivation and consequence, the problem of free will, determinism and responsibility, autonomy and discipline by others, happiness and pleasure, and virtues. This course will also touch upon those issues in applied Ethics, such as abortion, environment, business ethics, death sentence, etc.

description.zh: 1. 各種感測器結構、特性及工作原理簡介。2. 各種感測器之測量系統及轉換界面電路設計。3. 監控系統及感測器應用設計。
description.en: 1.Introduction of sensors.2.Measurement system of sensors.3.Application and design of sensors.

notes: 電子三四甲乙丙合開，新聘教師崔紘嘉

description.zh: 本課程將教授學生 FPGA 程式開發、硬體系統設計、和如何利用 FPGA 加速深度學習演算法。課程大綱如下：1. Xilinx & Vivado 開發環境 2. High-level Synthesis (HLS) & SystemC 程式開發 3. Finite Impulse Response (FIR) Filters4. Discrete Fourier Transform & Fast Fourier Transform5. Matrix Multiplication6. Prefix Sum and Histogram7. Video Systems8. Deep Learning Implementation on FPGA9. Pruning & Quantization10. Object Detection on FPGA
description.en: This course teaches FPGA programming, hardware system design, and how to implement and accelerate Deep Learning Algorithms on FPGA. The syllabus is shown below:1. Xilinx & Vivado IDE2. High-level Synthesis (HLS) & SystemC3. Finite Impulse Response (FIR) Filters4. Discrete Fourier Transform & Fast Fourier Transform5. Matrix Multiplication6. Prefix Sum and Histogram7. Video Systems8. Deep Learning Implementation on FPGA9. Pruning & Quantization10. Object Detection on FPGA

notes: 電子四甲乙丙合開，新聘教師賴建宏

description.zh: 本課程以培養學生尊重與欣賞不同族群、不同時空、不同價值觀所產生的音樂而設。藉由對音樂元素、本質的認知及介紹，欣賞各時期作曲家之代表作品，培養西方音樂的基本常識，建立音樂欣賞的專業態度。教學目標：1. 提高學生音樂欣賞的素養，充實其音樂生活的內涵，2. 激發學生對音樂的興趣，培育愛樂人口，增進社會祥和的原動力，3. 介紹古今中外音樂名家名作，啟發學生對音樂創作的認知與敬重，4. 建立學生對古典音樂、民族音樂、應用音樂及通俗音樂等不同類型音樂的正確認知與包容力，培養世界性的音樂觀。授課內容：1. 概論，2. 歌樂，3. 器樂，4. 儀式音樂，5. 舞蹈音樂，6. 戲劇音樂。
description.en: This course aims to cultivate students' ability to appreciate music of different ethnic groups, different time and place, different value systems. Through the introduction of basic music elements as well as the appreciation of the masterpieces of various composers, it is hoped that students will build up basic music knowledge about music and enhance professional music appreciation potentiality in music. The goals include: 1. Elevating students' capability in music appreciation 2. Inspiring students' interest in music with a view to improving our society into a harmonious world. 3. Introducing domestic and international famous composers' pieces 4. Touring of various forms of music: classical, ethnic, applied and popular music. Contents of this course include: 1.Introduction 2. Vocal music 3. Instrumental music 4. Ritual music 5. Dance music 6. Theatre music

description.zh: 本課程教導學生了解新創事業在智慧財產權與專利管理的基本知識，課程的教導將朝下列方向進行: (1) 新創事業智慧財產權的基本觀念與實務， (2) 專利資訊分析，(3) 專利演化與發展 ，(4) 創意產出，(5) 專利申請與保護 (6) 專利佈局 (7) 專利侵權鑑定 (8) 專利迴避設計 (9) 案例討論與分析。
description.en: This course teaches students Intellectual Property Rights and patent management for Entrepreneurship. The course includes topics as follows: (1) Basic knowledge and practices of Entrepreneurship Intellectual Property Rights; (2) The analysis of patent information; (3) The evolution and development for patent; (4) Innovative idea generation; (5) Application and protection of patent (6) Patent strategy (7) Patent violation，(8) Patent avoidance，(9) Cases study.

description.zh: 因是在大專教藝術欣賞的課程，我在設計課程上，即考慮雖同學們不是藝術本科學生，但秉持 "雖創作，但會欣賞的原則"，我的課程安排將從上古時代人類的美術創作活動進而引導解釋什麼是人類的美感經驗。讓他們明瞭東方藝術之同與不同，再介紹東西方的繪畫潮流，如西方：從文藝復興至寫實主義，印象主義，至超印象主義，東方：從漢的畫象磚開始至中國畫，書法之演進，中西繪畫之比較，內容是繁而多的。但我將用簡潔扼要的 "重點教學法", 寓教於樂的方式，讓同學不再懼怕 "Art'，甚至可以簡單的分辨出藝術品的年代，作者，及欣賞藝術作品的要領，這是我給此門課所訂的目標。另一個教學重點是：" 理論和實際併重 "。在每一單元中，我將設計一項簡的 [自己動手做] 大概祇花 20-30 分鐘讓學生體會和真正看見，明白，藝術家製造藝術品的過程。很希望能帶學生至博物院或美術館一趟，或至鶯砍參觀陶工廠。總之，一切課程計劃，乃配合學生之程度與興趣。
description.en: Because most students taking this course are not art major; therefore, I adhere to the principle of "Although not creation, appreciation will be instructed."  On course design, my class starts from the artistic creation of human beings in prehistoric time and further introduces the experience of beauty sensed by man and understand the similiar and difference of eastern and western art.  Moreover, I will introduce the fashion of priniting of eastern and western culture.  For example, the western culture: from the Renaissance to realism, impressionism and super impressionism.  Western culture: from a portrait stone of Han Dynasty to Chinese painting, the develpment of calligraphy and comparison of Chinese and western paintings. The teaching content is complicated, but I will simply it and highlight teaching way to let my students enjoy it.

description.zh: 本課程，擬引領修課同學們徜徉古今愛情文學作品；內容含括詩、詞、散文、小說、戲曲、視聽影像等，並以主題單元方式進行之。從中，仔細咀嚼或清澀曖昧、或清新動人、或可歌可泣、或刻骨銘心、或纏綿悱惻、或黯然銷魂的愛情文學作品；從中，與作品中所傳達的心情、心事、心聲產生共鳴，由此來發現：在塵世的繁華裡，情感的傳遞是沒有時空隔閡，是可以心心相映。鑑於修課同學正值青春年華、正將展翅翱翔，因此本課程除了鑑賞、品味古今愛情文學作品，並欲與吾人現實人生作一連結，由此思考愛情、婚姻、兩性、家國、社會、政治等議題，由此尋求愛情的本質與真諦。
description.en: The course to be taught to lead students know the love of ancient and modern literature; content encompasses poems, prose, fiction, drama, music, video works, etc., and will be conducted in a manner theme unit. From this, clear astringent taste ambiguous, fresh and moving, epic, unforgettable, deeply grieved and other types of love literature. In the process, the works convey mood, thoughts, aspirations, etc. to produce spiritual resonance. Thus to discover: In dust, there is no time and space to pass emotional estrangement, is matched heart.As the students is young, will start his life being so understanding of the course in addition to the love of ancient and modern literature, and our desire to make a real life connection. Thus thinking love, marriage, gender, home country, society, politics and other topics. Thus, the nature and essence of seeking love.

description.zh: 介紹日常生活中所經常遭遇到的案例使學生認識法律上之常識，培養學生珍惜法律上所賦予之權利，並及時行使庶免讓權利睡著了，致蒙受意外損害。並督促學生善盡法律上之責任，蔚為人人知法，人人守法的風尚，導致社會祥和。授課內容：按民法總則、債篇、物權、親屬、繼承各篇之順序，選擇與日常生活關係最密切之案例，逐一介紹，並對解決之道詳加說明。有觸及民間權益者，例如民間互助會，使用票據之常識，海峽兩岸婚姻，汽車肇事與保險責任及軍人及其家屬優待條例等均一併介紹。
description.en: This course-through carefully examining individual cases that often happen-helps understand more about legal knowledge so that they would cherish their endowed rights and protect themselves from being hurt. This course also encourages the students to serve the duty of laws in the hope that "All People Know The Laws and All People Follow The Laws." Thecontents: Introduction to General Principles, Provisions of Obligations, Family and Succession. Cases that have much to do with the daily life are picked up for discussion. Other topics like the mutual self-help funds, the use of checks, cross-strait marriages, vehicle accidents, insurance, bonus regulations on the military servicemen and their family are also included.

description.zh: 本課程將使學生學習到氣象的一些基本知識，並應用於日常生活中。內容包括太空中的地球、天氣的要素、鋒面與風暴、世界的氣候、氣候變遷、天氣的觀測與分析、天氣預報、雲的種類、天象導覽、天氣觀察者指南等。
description.en: This course will let students learn the basic knowledge of the weather and use it to their life. The content includes the earth in the space, elements of the weather, fronts and storms, climate of the world, climate change, observing and analyzing the weather, types of clouds, field guide to the sky, weather watcher's resource guide.

description.zh: 「物聯網（智慧聯網）」被視為繼個人電腦、網際網路之後，世界資訊產業的第三波浪潮。隨著科技的進步，網路早已成為人與人重要的溝通管道之一，而在未來的世界，透過物聯網技術，將賦予物件智慧並擁有與其它物件或人溝通的能力，換言之，未來網路不再只是人與人的溝通管道，更是聯繫全球物與物、人與物的橋樑。未來智慧型裝置有望相互連結、分享資料，進而改變人們的日常生活與企業的運作模式。
description.en: The Internet of Things ( IoT ) is regarded as the third wave after the invention of personal computer and the Internet.Through technological progress, the Internet has become an important way for people to communicate. In the future, the IoT technologies will enable objects to communicate with other objects, or human beings.In other words, the Internet will not only become a bridge between human beings, but also between objects, or even between human beings and objects.Future smart devices will be connected and shared across each other, changing how human beings live on a daily basis, and how enterprises operate.

name.en: Applications of Internet of Things ( IoT )

description.zh: 資料庫應用實務課程的目的在研習資料庫管理技術及其在企業的應用。本課程方向包括：熟悉資料庫基本指令及操作方法，以實務性方式，開發一套簡易應用軟體。培養學生對資料庫軟體設計開發之能力。
description.en: Database system application course is to study the database management techniques and its applications on enterprises. The course includes ：The students can understand the operation process in order to develop the data file. The opportunity to do the practical project independently.

notes: 葉英斌，工管甲乙丙合開，哈佛

description.zh: 機器視覺檢測乃結合光學設備 `影像處理` 與電腦輔助計算處理，藉由擷取受測物影像之特徵進行後續各種應用 (如檢測 ` 辯識等)。 為確保機器視覺應用之精確度及速度，受測物影像必須依用途進行不同前處理以突顯特徵，後以不同之演算法則判斷之擷取特徵是否符合應用要求。 機器視覺近年來大量使用於各產業，除提昇製造業之產品品質外，對人身安全認證之生物科技亦功不可沒 。
description.en: Machine vision has been extensively used in inspection and biometrics in recent years. This course provides the fundamentals and practical applications of machine vision for graduate students. Increasing the knowledge and capability in machine vision for a well-trained industrial engineer is the final goal of this course.

name.en: The Principles and Applications of Machine Vision

notes: 工管四甲乙、丙合開 碩班

description.zh: 本課程主要目的除了逐一介紹勞資關係各種常用方法之外，並針對每一方法提供了豐富的各種勞動法規應用範例，期望同學在修習完畢後，不僅了解勞動法規的主要方法，更重要的是讓同學藉由這些工具學習解決企業勞資關係問題的能力，對創造企業的競爭優勢有所認識。
description.en: This curriculum main goal besides introduced one by one the Industrial Relations each commonly used method, and aimed at each method to provide the rich each kind of Labor Laws, expected the schoolmate after repaired the custom to finish, not only the understanding Industrial Relations main method, more importantly let the schoolmate affiliation by these tool study solution enterprise Industrial Relations questions abilities, to create the enterprise the competitive advantage to have the understanding.

description.zh: 探討如何規畫、組織、用人、領導及控制各種資源包括人員、設備、材料、資金，期能及時在容許預算下完成特定專案。
description.en: This course discovers the planning, organization, employment, leading and control of resources including person, facility, materials, and capital in order to complete the project under the pre-specified time and cost.

description.zh: 本課程著重冷凍系統和空調系統能源的分析，探討構成系統的主要元件－壓縮機、蒸發器和冷凝器的耗能，和各泵、冰水盤管、空調箱及風／水管路系統的能源耗損，進而對整個系統運轉時的效率予以檢討。最後提出各種改善方法，節約能源和減少電力契約容量的技術，以使學生具有節能省電的正確理論觀念和實務技術。
description.en: This lesson is focused on the energy analyses of refrigeration systems and air-conditioning systems. The operating defects of compressors, evaporators andcondensers are to be investigated. Also the energy consumption's of pumps, fan coils air-handling units and duct/water systems are studied. The over all performance of the entire system is thus discussed. Several methods to improve the shortages and the techniques to energy conservation and electricity demand cut-down will be proposed.The students should understand correctly the theory of energy conservation and thetechnology to improve the systems.

description.zh: 本課程使學生對燃料電池的基本原理、關鍵技術、以及商品化發展與應用過程，有所瞭解並加以分析及探討。燃料電池是一種電化學的發電裝置，其運作原理係利用電化學反應將燃料內之化學能直接轉換為電能，因其在能量轉換過程中並不經過熱機過程，因此能量轉換效率較高。本課程之授課綱要可分為以下幾項：燃料電池簡介、燃料電池之效率、質子交換膜燃料電池、磷酸燃料電池、鹼性燃料電池、直接甲醇燃料電池、固態氧化物燃料電池、燃料電池的燃料供應、燃料電池之計算實例。
description.en: This course enables students to fully understand the basic principles of the fuel cell, key technologies, and the commercialization of the development and the application process, and to analyze and discuss the design of fuel cell system.Fuel cell is an electrochemical power generating device. It can directly convert the chemical energy of fuel into the electrical energy via the electrochemical reaction. Because it does not go through the process of thermal engine in the energy conversion process, and therefore a higher energy conversion efficiency. Teaching outlines of the course can be divided into the followings:Introduction to fuel cell, Fuel cell efficiency, Proton exchange membrane fuel cell, Phosphoric acid fuel cell, Alkaline fuel cell, Direct methanol fuel cell, Solid oxide fuel cell, Fueling fuel cell, Calculation example of fuel cell.

description.zh: 本課程係提供本校學生與創意界交流的平台，提供學生建立人文藝術相關之涵養，並協助學生體驗文化生活創意之實務過程，透過邀請國內著名之文化生活創意相關之產、官、學界專家進行專題講座，經由專家之經驗分享與傳承，以激發學生透過自身生活之經驗學習創意發展之可能性，開發其創意之潛能。
description.en: Course Description：    This course provide a platform to generate between student and creativity. It could students to build the temperament of human arts, and experience practical process of cultural life creativity. Through the invitation of the cultural life creative expert in production, official, education to have a speech. By the way of sharing and passing down, it could stimulate the learning creative develop possibility of students in their daily life, and develop the potential of creativity.

name.zh: 創新講座 -- 文化生活創意

notes: 創新碩 (日職)、設計博合開；設計 B01

description.zh: 有鑑於電子商務的迅速發展，本課程在幫助此課程學習者能夠應用免費的軟體和網路服務，製作一個電子商務的商業網站，無論同學自行創業或到公司服務，都可以因應電子商務的業務需求。
description.en: This course will teach the students to learn to build up an e-commerce website .

notes: 工管二甲、丙合開，計中電腦教室

description.zh: 本課程將專注於創新產品與混合實境的設計研究實務，期望透過虛實整合與使用者經驗的核心概念，應用研究方法深入探究設計問題與使用者經驗中的痛點，探討實體端產品設計和虛擬端的服務設計之各種實務應用，進而透過設計方法與軟硬體技術落實創新概念，最終達到設計出符合與滿足使用者在未來生活中的各種設計服務與體驗。
description.en: This course will focus on the design research case study of innovative products and mixed reality. It is expected that through the core concepts of virtual-real integration and user experience, it will apply research methods to deeply explore design problems and pain points in user experience and explore physical product design and virtual reality. We will integrate various possibilities of service design with industry case study. Then, we intend to utilize the implemented innovative concept by design methods, software, and hardware technologies to achieve the design services and experiences that meet and satisfy users in future life.

name.zh: 產品與混合實境設計研究 (二)
name.en: Product and Mixed Reality Design Research (2)

description.zh: 先修課程：4402014 或負責教授同意燃料及燃燒，基本熱傳理論，蒸汽動力廠，壓縮機，燃氣輪機，內燃機，汽油引擎，柴油引擎，冷凍空調循環。
description.en: Fuels and Combustion, Principles of Heat Transfer, Steam Power Plants Compressors, Gas Turbines, Internal Combustion Engines: Gasoline Engines, Diesel Engines, Refrigeration And Air Conditioning.

description.zh: 電池分類，電池化學，電池功能及表現，電池之製造，電池使用注意事項，電池檢驗及測試，電池選擇及安裝，燃料電池，電動車使用之電池未來高級電池之介紹。
description.en: Battery Classification，Battery Chemistry，Battery Function and Performance，Battery Manufacturing，Battery service Precautions，Battery Inspection and Testing，Battery Selection and Installation，Fuel Battery， Battery for the Electric Vehicle，Introduction to the Advanced Future Battery.

description.zh: 字彙，文法，閱讀，解讀。
description.en: Vocabulary, grammar, reading, decipherment.

description.zh: 微奈米量測工程技術為是現代科技發展之重要前瞻技術，它將探討有效尺寸在微奈米等級範圍之精密量測儀器與技術。本課程將涵括下列各項現代精密量測主題：1. 近代光電量測系統與技術 2. 量測統計原理 3. 量測信號處理 4. 三次元座標量測系統與技術 5. 雷射干涉系統與技術 6. 影像量測系統與技術 7. 微奈米量測系統與技術 - 干涉術、相位移術、調變術、光共焦 及   自動聚焦術 8. 微奈米量測系統與技術 -- 掃瞄探針顯微鏡 (SPM), STM, AFM 及   SNOM.9. 奈米粉體量測系統與技術 10. 量測實驗 11. 小型量測儀器之專題製作
description.en: This subject is arranged to introduce the advanced systems and technology associated with micro- and nano-scale measurement. The subject includes the following subtopics:1.Modern opto-electro measurement systems and techniques2.Statistic principles for measurement3.Signal processing techniques4.Three-dimensional measurement systems and techniques5.Laser interferometric metrology and systems6.Image processing techniques for metrology7.Micro and nano-measurement systems and techniques (I) -   Moire interferometry, phase shifting, signal modulation,   confocal and auto-focusing techniques.8.Micro- and nano-measurement systems and techniques (II) -   SPM, STM, AFM and SNOM.9.Nano-particle measurement systems and techniques10.Student laboratory/practices11.Team project work for design and fabrication of    small-scaled measurement instrument

name.zh: 微奈米量測系統與技術
